name: Destropia (Tank Game)
description:
Destropia is  based on the Tanks Demo by Unity.

Player 1 movement controls : W, S,A,D.

Player 1 Fire : Space bar (hold for longer Range and increased damage) 

Player 2 movement controls : Up, Down , Left and Right arrows

Player 2 Fire : Enter key  (hold for longer Range and increased damage) 

Created by :George Kostoglou & Samuel Dayomi

Trios College , Video Game Design Tech

Mississauga Ontario
